name: Self Knowledge
description: Read and update Talos's own personality, plugin instructions, and notes about the human user.

functions.name: read_document
functions.description: Read one of Talos's knowledge documents: 'soul' (personality and behavior), 'plugins' (plugin usage instructions), or 'human' (notes about the user).

functions.name: write_document
functions.description: Update one of Talos's knowledge documents. The entire document is replaced with the new content.

content.description: The new markdown content for the document.
